Member Function Documentation

uint32_t GAFTextureAtlas::getMemoryConsumptionStat ( ) const

All CCImages will be freed at the first call of textures() So there is only VRAM occupation In case you don't want to release CCImages at textures(), remove releasing ones and after calling getMemoryConsumptionStat you will need x2 a given number: RAM + VRAM
